title: Flashlight
desc:
Post 1216
- May also be played if someone plays a negative effect against someone thats not you.
- The negative effect doesnt happen, and the person who caused the negative effect draws a <:yellow:1106234135384699023> card, a <:gray:1107516393450127411> card, and a <:inferno:1118594776716021780> card. They have no idea what the cards are.
